title: Dr.Lychee & Hatchhyack
skill:
You can only play black Battle Cards and this card can't attack.
When a Battle Card attacks, the player who attacked can't attack with tokens or Battle Cards with energy costs of 7 or less other than the card they attacked with for the duration of the turn.
Place the top card of your deck under this card : Place the top card of your deck in your Drop Area, then draw 1 card.
If you only have black cards in your energy, choose 3 cards under this card and place them in their owners' Drop Areas : You may draw 1 card and flip this card over.
skill_back:
You can only play black Battle Cards.
When a Battle Card attacks, the player who attacked can't attack with tokens or Battle Cards with energy costs of 7 or less other than the card they attacked with for the duration of the turn.
When this card attacks, this card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn, and you draw 1 card.
